reflections.name: naming-is-matter
reflections.content:
Consider code block, can you spot an error in a second given its wrapped up in business logic details?

Dictionary espressos = new Dictionary();
void ProcessCoffee()
{
...
}

I couldn't and spent too much time figuring out trivial bug. What if I would get this block to work with instead.

Dictionary lungos = new Dictionary();
void ProcessCoffee()
{
...
}

Much easier to spot.

Naming is matter.

Name things as best (closest to reality) as you can as soon as you can.
